attributes.action: to hold a public inquiry into why the MOD where allowed to inject troops with the whooping cough vaccine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: troops before the 1990/91 war where injected with the whooping vaccine Pertussi although this is a licenced vaccine the MOD where using it for a purpose that it had not been licenced for .and where warned not to use this vaccine on adults The result of which has left most Vets ill dead or dying
